name: Chaos Maze
description:
Hello, Good Eve/Day Wellcome to My Chaotic maze :)

A short game was made in less than a week for brackeys's 6th jam, with the theme of let there be chaos, I've changed the concept three times and finally settled on this version XD. 

how incorporated the theme in my game was by creating a sort of chaotic player behavior and the level design I went with a confusing maze where if you lose too many times you will need to find another route. 

How to play :

the right and left arrows to move, you can double jump in mid-air using the Z button. 

I hope you have fun playing it :)
